title: Elements
description: Styles for html tags. MUST NOT contain styles for any classes, ids, or attributes. `Element` SHOULD use `bits` to construct rule sets.

sections.title: Headings
description: Part of the typography module. MUST use `$h1` - `$h6` variables.

sections.title: Links & Paragraphs
description: Part of the typogrpahy module. MUST use `$text_size` and `$text_line_height` variables.

sections.title: Lists
description: Lists module MUST use `$lists_font_size` and `$lists_line_height` variables. SHOULD lay foundational styles for `collection` lists.

sections.title: Forms
description: Forms module SHOULD lay foundational styles for forms `collections`.

sections.title: Tables
description: Tables module SHOULD lay foundational styles for tables `collections`.
